resource_requirements: RAM File System (for Alluxio's tiered storage)
notes: The script uses SLURM for job submission and management.
It requires a shared storage system (NFS) to access the Magpie scripts.
The script sets up Alluxio, Hadoop, HBase, Spark, TensorFlow, and Zookeeper if configured.
It leverages Lustre for data storage.
Java and Python are used for running the various software components.
The script utilizes RAM File System for Alluxio's tiered storage.
